detaileddescription.para: Refer BASS SPEC Broadcast Receive State Characteristic Section 3.2

briefdescription.para: Synchronize to PA, PAST not available.

detaileddescription.para: Refer BASS SPEC Section 3.1.1.4 Add Source operation
Refer BASS SPEC Broadcast Receive State Characteristic Section 3.2

briefdescription.para: Informs the server that the client is not scanning for Broadcast Sources on behalf of the server.
Informs the server that the client is scanning for Broadcast Sources on behalf of the server.
Requests the server to add information including Metadata for a Broadcast Source, and requests the server to synchronize to a PA and/or BIS transmitted by the Broadcast Source.
Requests the server to update Metadata, to synchronize to, or to stop synchronizing to a PA and/or BIS transmitted by the Broadcast Source identified by the Source_ID.
Provides the server with the Broadcast_Code to decrypt a BIS transmitted by a Broadcast Source identified by the Source_ID.
Requests the server to remove all information for a Broadcast Source identified by the Source_ID.

detaileddescription.para: Refer BASS SPEC Broadcast Audio Scan Control Point Characteristic Section 3.1

parameterdescription.para: Number of BASS instances to be created.

briefdescription.para: Subscribe to all characteristics of bass server.
Check if BASS discovery is in progress.
Get bass receive state values from the stream.

parameterdescription.para: : Stream received from the peer device
: values of the receive state characteristic after parsing

briefdescription.para: Get subgroup data from the stream.

parameterdescription.para: : Stream received from the peer device
: values of the subgroup after parsing

briefdescription.para: Get control point data from the stream.

parameterdescription.para: : Stream received from the peer device

briefdescription.para: Check if peer device is scan delegator.

parameterdescription.para: : adv received from the peer device

simplesect.para: true if peer device is scan delegator false otherwise
